text: "Dirty Laundry" is a 1982 song by Don Henley. It was taken from his debut studio album I Can't Stand Still. It went to number 1 in Canada, number 2 in South Africa, number 3 in the United States, number 7 in New Zealand and number 8 in Austria. == References == Category:1982 songs Category:Don Henley songs Category:Nickelback songs Category:Rock songs
title: Dirty Laundry (Don Henley song)
